0000000_00000_00000_000_01000_0110011   //PC= 0  add $t0,$0,$0
000000001010_00000_000_01001_0010011    //PC= 4  addi $t1,$0,10
0000000_00000_01000_010_00000_0100011   //PC= 8  sw $0,0($t0)
0000000_01001_01000_010_00100_0100011   //PC=12  sw $t1,4($t0)
000000000100_01000_010_01101_0000011    //PC=16  lw $t5,4($t0)
0000000_01001_01101_000_01111_0110011   //PC=20  add $t7,$t5,$t1       (hazard!)
000000001101_00000_000_01010_0010011    //PC=24  addi $t2,$0,13        (stall 1 cycle)
0000001_01001_01001_000_01011_0110011   //PC=28  mul $t3,$t1,$t1
0000000_00000_00000_000_01100_1100011   //PC=32  beq $0, $0, Jump
000000000001_01001_000_01001_0010011    //PC=36  addi $t1,$t1,1        (flush)
000000000001_01001_000_01001_0010011    //PC=40  addi $t1,$t1,1
0100000_01001_01010_000_01010_0110011   //PC=44  Jump: sub $t2,$t2,$t1
0000000_01010_01001_111_01011_0110011   //PC=48  and $t3,$t1,$t2
0000000_01011_01010_110_01100_0110011   //PC=52  or $t4,$t2,$t3
